data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of West Grand Bahama.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Grand Bahama, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 26,400 people living in West Grand Bahama through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in West Grand Bahama.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Please, convict the 10,455 believers in West Grand Bahama, Bahamas to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of West End
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of West End, West Grand Bahama, Bahamas.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of West Grand Bahama words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of West Grand Bahama, Bahamas need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of West Grand Bahama, Bahamas has a population of 26,400.

We estimate West Grand Bahama has 10,455 people who might know Jesus, 14,482 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,463 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in West Grand Bahama with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
